tns:patch.author: Armen Gharibyan
tns:patch.description: Year list in Global Settings needs to go beyond 2011

script.lang: INSERT INTO util_global_settings_possible_( setting_name, value_id, value_shown) VALUES ('Current Fiscal Year', '2012', '2012'), ('Current Fiscal Year', '2013', '2013'), ('Current Fiscal Year', '2014', '2014'), ('Current Fiscal Year', '2015', '2015'), ('Current Fiscal Year', '2016', '2016'), ('Current Fiscal Year', '2017', '2017'), ('Current Fiscal Year', '2018', '2018'), ('Current Fiscal Year', '2019', '2019');
